summary: The Department of Energy holds 2 million barrels of heating oil and gasoline in commercial storage facilities across the Northeast. These reserves were established to reduce the impact of severe supply disruptions in the region. We found the current reserves are not well suited to this task. title: Energy Resilience: DOE's Northeast Petroleum Product Reserves
